resources.string: 1. All of the songs in AN AMERICAN WEREWOLF IN LONDON have the word \"howl\" in the title.
2. Michael Myer\'s middle name is Audrey.
3. The stars of which two movies were hired from a single shared casting session.
4. Nick Castle, who played Michael Myers in the original HALLOWEEN, went on to direct which two of the following family movies?
5. Which is the only FRIDAY THE 13TH movie with no nudity?
6. Which horror Which horror movie was the first American film to show a flushing toilet?
